name: Emotive Brand

overview:
We are a San Francisco-based consultancy specializing in emotive branding.

We transform the way brands make people feel, and how people feel about brands.

We offer a full range of brand strategy services, including a number of proprietary tools.

We create write, and design ideas to activate your brand, both inside and out.

Small and nimble at our core, we have a vast network of experienced and talented people who help us bring emotion and meaning to diverse industries and enterprises - for both B2B and consumer brands.

UPS, Miller Coors, Informatica, The Kohler Company, Belkin, VMware, Zynga, WAFUNIF, Gibson Dunn, TEA Collection, TED Global, KickBack, Hanson Bridget, Kleiner Perkins have trusted us with their brands in the last 24 months.

In the world of hard-nosed commerce, our job is to make people feel really good about the choices they make.

Nice work if you can get it.

Specialties

Brand Consultancy, brand strategy, purpose and values, employee engagement, internal brand, emotive branding, meaningful brands, emotional branding, internal culture, Corporate Reporting, CSR, Design
